text: Dusha, obremenennaya svoyeyu nosheyu, ne obremenitsya bremenem drugoy; a yesli ona, otyagoshchayemaya, i pozovet ponesti yego, to nikto ne poneset yego, khotya by tot byl blizkiy yeye rodstvennik. Ty nauchish' tol'ko tekh, kotoryye v tayne boyatsya Boga svoyego, i sovershayut molitvu: kto budet chist, tot budet chist tol'ko dlya sebya samogo; u Boga pribezhishche vsemu
